description: A biomaterial entity contains information about biological material that was generated/used in the project and includes everything from a whole organism down to subcellular components.
title: biomaterial_core

biomaterial_id.description: A unique ID for this biomaterial.

name.description: A short, descriptive name for the biomaterial that need not be unique.

description.description: A general description of the biomaterial.

genus_species.description: The scientific binomial name for the species of the biomaterial. e.g. Homo sapiens.

derived_from.description: If this biomaterial is derived from another biomaterial, enter the biomaterial_id for the biomaterial it was derived from.
derived_from.comment: This field is primarily required for spreadsheet-based submissions.

supplementary_files.description: A list of filenames of biomaterial-level supplementary files.

biosd_biomaterial.description: A DDBJ, NCBI, or EBI BioSample ID. Accessions must start with SAMD, SAMN, or SAME.

insdc_biomaterial.description: An INSDC (International Nucleotide Sequence Database Collaboration) sample accession. Can be from the DDBJ, EMBL-EBI, or NCBI. Accession must start with DRS, ERS, or SRS.
